casebody.data:
STINER
v.
AMAZON.COM, INC. 2019-0488 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 20, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy and Stewart, JJ., dissent.

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISION

On motion for reconsideration. Motion granted. The parties shall brief this case in accordance with the Rules of Practice of the Supreme Court of Ohio.
